game.name: Guns & Bottles
game.description:
OMG! This latest action-packed challenge is already played by a large number of kids, teenagers and adults due to reason because it helps players to improve their coordination, timing and overall aiming. The gameplay and controls of the game are pretty simple and easy to understand. There are multiple levels to play through and your job in each level is to control a spinning revolver that you see on the screen of your PC or mobile phone. Find plenty of green bottles floating around!

Click or tap the screen to burst those bottles and clear the level in this brand new bottle shooting game! In the advanced levels, both revolver and bottles will keep moving around. Remember the speed of the spin will also keep increasing with your every shoot. Make sure to avoid shooting the red bottles and even bosses in the further levels to stay in the game. Shoot the rotating bottles at a perfect time to get a high score!

Your hard always pays off so hitting the bottles three times continuously will reward you with some extra 5 coins. However, make sure that you will keep yourself away from the red bottles, otherwise, you will lose the game immediately. Try to grab as many coins as you can to buy 12 unique and powerful superguns in this cool action-packed game! We are pretty sure that your amazing shooting abilities will guide you through all levels and become a real gunslinger in this arcade classic. Good luck!
